description:
Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Come with Me! The Survival Scheme of Sweat and Tears
Minna Ore ni Tsuite Koi! Ase to Namida no Takurami Dai Survival
ทุกคนตามฉันมา! เกมส์รอดตายบนเขาทาคุรามิ
みんなオレについて来い! 汗と涙のタクラミ大サバイバル
